evidence.claim: Brush Creek Partners utilizes AWS for cloud services and infrastructure.
The company has developed solutions compliant with HIPAA regulations, ensuring secure health data management.
They implement FHIR standards in their health technology solutions for interoperability.
Brush Creek integrates X12 transaction sets for healthcare claims processing.
Azure is part of the technologies used to support their platform services.

icp.icp_reason: No specific use cases for X12 transactions found on their site.
